DEMO_034_MSG_010:
̅Hmm, what a magnificent specimen you have scouted! You have 
done well to fulfill my request, by scouting this Bullfinch.
DEMO_034_MSG_020:
̅Yes, yes... The time has finally arrived...
ā
DEMO_034_MSG_100:
̅With your newly befriended Bullfinch, ȁ... I need you to assist us in reaching the City of Mankind!
ā
DEMO_034_MSG_030:
̅As long as I can remember, ȁ... Our species and your species, from a nearby city, have long since been allies.
ā
DEMO_034_MSG_110:
̅Come, my loyal subjects! The time is upon us, to join 
ȁ on his journey, and provide our own assistance!
DEMO_034_MSG_040:
̅However, when the Break Monsters appeared, they cut us off from the humans, and we've since lost contact completely.
ā
DEMO_034_MSG_120: ̅We will head out immediately, for the cliffs to the north of Wood Park! We shall rendevous there with you ȁ!
DEMO_034_MSG_050:
̅They destroyed a bridge near the cliffs, and disabled our transportation devices used to travel to their city.
ā
DEMO_034_MSG_060:
̅Ever since, I've been worried sick as to what's become of their city... and even worse, of their inhabitants...
ā
DEMO_034_MSG_070: ̅Unfortunately, we've had not way to fix this problem ourselves. We have neither the ability nor strength to build a bridge across.
DEMO_034_MSG_080:
̅As we were traveling one day, that was when I saw it... 
A Bullfinch suddenly leapt across the gap in the cliffs!
ā
DEMO_034_MSG_090: ̅When you learned to ride monsters, I realized that by scouting a Bullfinch, you'd be able to leap over the ravine!
